name: WOOP Digital
description:
TURNING CONCEPTS AND IDEAS INTO BUSINESS
We offer our customers the development of individual mobile iOS applications, web solutions, website development, internet projects, start-ups, landings, online stores and web outsourcing.
WE ARE FOCUSED ON RESULTS AND IMPLEMENTATION
Our company specializes in an integrated approach to the development, support and development of mobile applications, web sites, online stores.
YOU CAN LAUNCH YOUR IDEA TODAY
The main activities of WOOP are the b2c / b2b segments. We accumulate the most effective solutions to the tasks, where each of our moves is justified, calculated and calibrated. The projects being developed cover various spheres. The main ones are retail trade, services, shopping centers, marketplaces, geo-location solutions, mobile payments and much more.
READ MORE...
